game.name: Hilarious Delivery
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Take orders, fire up the stoves! Hilarious Delivery is a single-player and co-op restaurant sim where you run a frantic takeout shop against the clock. Cook dishes, then pull off the perfect handoff to your delivery rider.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take orders, fire up the stoves! Hilarious Delivery is a single-player and co-op restaurant sim where you run a frantic takeout shop against the clock. Cook dishes, then pull off the perfect handoff to your delivery rider.
